titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Brooklyn Young People's Prohibition League minutes 1977.492
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:11:05 +0000.

did.unittitle: Brooklyn Young People's Prohibition League minutes
did.abstract: Handwritten minutes from five meetings of the Brooklyn Young People's Prohibition League from January through May of 1909. LIsts of officers and locations where the meetings were held are also included in the minutes.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn Young People's Prohibition League minutes, 1977.492, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Harriet Stryker-Rodda from the estate of Dr. George Robson Mott, 1956.
